pass.description: Minimum values: no further game interest

toGame.description: Bid game with fit and values
Drive to game with sufficient values

minorGame.description: Play game in minor when suitable

supportOpenerSuit.description: Set trump and continue forcing auction

supportResponderSuit.description: Confirm fit and continue toward game/slam

signoff.description: Accept game if no slam interest

newMinorForcing.description: Artificial ask for major fit or extra information

fourthSuitForcing.description: Artificial game-force inquiry after three natural suits bid

conventions.Jacoby 2NT: 2NT over 1H/1S with 4-card major and game forcing hand
conventions.Takeout Doubles: Double of opponent's suit opening with opening hand
conventions.Michaels Cuebid: Cuebid of opponent's suit showing 5-5 in two unbid suits
conventions.Unusual 2NT: 2NT over opponent's suit showing 5-5 in the two highest unbid suits
conventions.Splinter Bids: Double jump shift showing singleton or void and support for partner's suit
conventions.Support Doubles: Double of partner's suit opening showing 3-card support
conventions.Inverted Minors: 1NT rebid shows 4-card minor, 2NT rebid shows 5-card minor
conventions.Fourth Suit Forcing: Bid of fourth suit at lowest level forcing to game
conventions.Relay Bids: Artificial bids asking partner for more information
conventions.Cappelletti: Over opponent's 1NT, 2C shows any one-suited hand, 2D shows both majors, 2H/2S show that major and a minor
conventions.DONT: Over opponent's 1NT, double shows any one-suited hand, 2C shows clubs or diamonds, 2D shows diamonds or hearts, 2H shows hearts or spades, 2S shows spades or clubs
